course_title: Special Topics: Film and Media: Carving Out Space for US
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 12 / Seats Avail: 3Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
Intro to experimental film with particular focus on makers of color. Coursework centers film, writing, and varied visual media that is non-traditional, non-linear, non-narrative along with intro to experimental and analog processing. Some production experience is preferred, but not required.


MCP Elective
course_description: Rotating topics in film and media. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies.
prerequisites: FILM 101 or FILM_OX 101 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 6024, Section #: 3, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: T. Galanis, Status: Open
